directions: Place the potatoes, water, and butter into a slow cooker. Season with salt, garlic powder, and pepper. Cover, and cook on Low for 7 hours, or High for 4 hours.
Mash potatoes with a masher or electric beater, adding the desired amount of milk to achieve a creamy consistency. Keep warm on low until serving.
ingredients: 2 pounds red potatoes, diced with peel
title: Slow Cooker Garlic Mashed Potatoes
